entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning early in the evening except periods of rain near Lake Superior. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
